detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.

Mules in cotton canvas with partly covered heels and a wide foot strap with a decorative buckle in tortoiseshell-patterned plastic. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7 cm.
Fitted, calf-length dress in jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and draping at one side.
Bolero in a soft cotton pointelle knit with a decorative button at the neck and long sleeves.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and a raw-edge hem.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Cardigan in a soft knit with a round neckline and knot-shaped metal buttons down the front. Long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ballet pumps with fine details, rounded toes and a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and finely fluted soles. Heel 0.4 cm.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front.
Fitted top in jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and a covered metal ring at the front.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and zip fly and button. Loose fit with gently tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Belt in grained imitation leather with an adjustable fastening and a detachable round mini-bag with a zip at the top. Lined. Size 2x10 cm. Width of belt 2 cm.
Large, round sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Jacket in washed denim with worn details, a print motif and embroidery. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Fully lined bikini briefs with a textured pattern and a low waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, open chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Jacket in a patterned rustle weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood with an elasticated front edge. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight, wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Trainers in printed cotton jersey with a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Round plastic earrings with hoop-shaped pendants. Length 4.5 cm.
Blouse in an airy weave with a flounce at the front, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem.
Cropped cardigan in a soft knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed trims.

Dress with a matching hairband in soft organic cotton. Sleeveless dress with buttons on the shoulders and a sewn-in bodysuit with elasticated hems and press-studs at the crotch. Hairband with a sewn-in knot at the front and covered elastic at the back of the neck.
A-line dress in velour with a Peter Pan collar, long sleeves and press-studs at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in patterned jersey with a boat neck and gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with an elasticated seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in patterned mesh with a round neckline, short sleeves and flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Scarf in a softly draping, patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, ribbed cuffs and an elasticated hem. Partly lined in fleece.
Short top in jersey crêpe with ties at the front, long trumpet sleeves and a flounce at the hem.
Soft viscose jersey T-shirt in a slightly wider style with a V-neck.

Set with a vest top, pair of shorts and a T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Vest top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Knee-length shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist. Classic T-shirt with ribbing around the neckline.
Jacquard-knit slipover in a soft cotton blend containing some wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.
Tunic in soft viscose jersey with a sheen. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.

Short, sleeveless lace dress in a narrow cut at the top with a button at the back of the neck and a deep, scallop-edged opening down the back. Seam at the waist with gathers for added width and soft draping. Jersey lining.
Cropped sports top in fast-drying mesh with a rib-trimmed neckline, long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in a linen and cotton blend with a round neckline, open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with lightly padded cups and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Straight-cut V-neck top in a linen weave with narrow shoulder straps.

Long, padded bomber jacket with a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped pocket on one sleeve, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in gently draping twill with notch lapels. Slits and a button at the cuffs, welt front pockets with a flap, and a single back vent. Lined.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.
Cap in a cotton weave with a flap at the back to protect the back of the neck.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Boxy-style hooded top in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short swim top with long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Round-neck jumper in a sturdy, fine knit with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Semi-circular clutch bag in paper straw with embroidery and a zip at the top. Lined. Size approx. 3.5x15x27 cm.

Platform shoes in patent imitation leather with closed lacing at the front and a decorative welt seam around the sole. Canvas linings and insoles and a fluted rubber sole. Platform height at the front approx 4 cm, heel approx 5.5 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in a soft merino wool rib knit with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Bootees in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with elastication around the ankles and top. Soft fleece linings and insoles and soft soles. The bootees have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Top in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a collar and rhinestone-decorated buttons at the top. Gently dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a ribbed hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with long sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fully lined V-neck sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow shoulder straps that join at the back and an elasticated hem.

Set with a long-sleeved cotton jersey top and a skirt in a double layer of tulle. Top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Skirt with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Short, fitted tube dress in ribbed cotton jersey with narrow elastication at the top.
All-in-one suit in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Short shorts in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and raw-edge hem.
Flared top in soft jersey with an elasticated neckline and flounce at the top that continues across the shoulders. Overlocked edges.
High-waisted, calf-length skirt in an airy viscose weave with a concealed zip. Decorative covered buttons and a high split at one side. Unlined.

Set with a long-sleeved cotton jersey top and a skirt in a double layer of tulle. Top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Skirt with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a high stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbed cuffs.

Super push-up lace bra with lacing at the front and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent breathable functional fabric with closed seams at critical points, a lined hood with a peak and elastic drawstring, and a zip down the front. Side pockets, a chest pocket, zipped lift pass pocket and two inner pockets, one with a zip and the other in mesh. Snow flap with reinforced elastication and press-studs at the waist, an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Straight T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front. Round neck with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Suede slippers with pile linings and insoles and soft suede soles.

Short shirt dress in softly draping woven fabric with a sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Dungarees in stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a pocket at the top and fake front and back pockets. Seam at the waist, buttons at the sides and slim legs.
